investigation_objectives.title: Identify The Null's Identity
investigation_objectives.description: Determine the real identity of the hacker known as 'The Null' through analysis of digital artifacts
validation_criteria: Evidence of user account 'TheNull' found in disk analysis
Process artifacts showing malicious activity under this user account
Network communications linked to this identity

investigation_objectives.title: Reconstruct Attack Timeline
investigation_objectives.description: Create a detailed timeline of the attack from initial compromise to data exfiltration

investigation_objectives.title: Document Malware Activities
investigation_objectives.description: Analyze and document all malicious software used in the attack

investigation_objectives.title: Trace Network Communications
investigation_objectives.description: Map all suspicious network activities and command & control communications

investigation_objectives.title: Assess Data Compromise
investigation_objectives.description: Determine what data was accessed, modified, or exfiltrated during the attack

perfect_score.title: Master Digital Forensics Investigator
perfect_score.description: Outstanding work! You've successfully identified The Null and completely reconstructed the cyber attack.
perfect_score.message: Congratulations! You've achieved a perfect investigation. All objectives completed with comprehensive evidence correlation. The Null's identity has been conclusively established, and your forensic report provides irrefutable evidence for prosecution.

high_score.title: Expert Digital Forensics Analyst
high_score.description: Excellent investigation! You've identified The Null and documented most aspects of the cyber attack.
high_score.message: Well done! You've successfully identified The Null and documented the majority of the attack. Your investigation shows strong forensic methodology and evidence correlation skills.

passing_score.title: Competent Digital Forensics Investigator
passing_score.description: Good work! You've gathered sufficient evidence to identify The Null with reasonable confidence.
passing_score.message: Good work! You've met the minimum requirements for the investigation. The Null's identity has been established with sufficient evidence, though some aspects of the attack could be better documented.

failed.title: Investigation Incomplete
failed.description: The investigation lacks sufficient evidence to conclusively identify The Null.
failed.message: The investigation is incomplete. More evidence is needed to establish The Null's identity and document the cyber attack. Review the investigation objectives and gather additional forensic evidence.

evidence_correlation.description: Points awarded for correlating evidence across multiple sources
criteria: Cross-reference disk artifacts with memory dumps
Correlate network traffic with process activity
Link timeline events across evidence sources

forensic_methodology.description: Points for following proper digital forensics procedures
criteria: Verify evidence integrity with hash validation
Use appropriate forensic tools and techniques

report_quality.description: Assessment of final forensic report completeness and accuracy

required_findings: Malicious processes running under TheNull account
Personal files/documents linking to real identity

recommended_steps.title: Evidence Intake and Verification
recommended_steps.description: Use Evidence Locker to verify all evidence integrity and establish chain of custody

recommended_steps.title: Disk Forensics Analysis
recommended_steps.description: Analyze disk images to find user accounts, malicious files, and filesystem artifacts

recommended_steps.title: Memory Analysis
recommended_steps.description: Examine memory dumps for running processes, network connections, and malware signatures

recommended_steps.title: Network Traffic Analysis
recommended_steps.description: Investigate network captures for suspicious communications and data exfiltration

recommended_steps.title: Timeline Construction
recommended_steps.description: Correlate findings across all evidence sources to build attack timeline

recommended_steps.title: Report Generation
recommended_steps.description: Document findings in legally-compliant forensic report with proper evidence citations
